title: SKT T1 Zed skin, will it ever come back?
body: Will SKT T1 zed be out again? PLease tell me when if not, tell me the ugly truth.

replies.body:
SKT T1 Zed is a Legacy skin, so there's a chance that it may return.  In the meantime, he can also be found through mystery gifts or Hextech Crafting.  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay updated on any new or returning content!  Hope that helps!

Wow!
